name: Melissa Clark's Pan Con Tomate
keywords: appetizer, side dish, bread, tomato, summer
recipeIngredient: 4 thick slices country-style bread, toasted and still hot

recipeInstructions.text: Rub bread with garlic halves. Drizzle slices with oil, and sprinkle with salt. Rub tomato cut side down on toasted bread, generously squeezing insides out as you go. Sprinkle with additional salt, and top with additional slices of tomatoes if desired.
